MakeCode: Writing data for hacking stem experiments
MakeCode.agentAnalyze: Check for any hazards in a direction
MakeCode.agentAnalyze|param|dir: the direction to check for hazards
MakeCode.agentDestroyL4: Commands the agent to destroy a block in the given direction
MakeCode.agentDestroyL4|param|dir: the direction to destroy a block at
MakeCode.agentDestroyL5: Commands the agent to destroy a block in the given direction
MakeCode.agentDestroyL5|param|dir: the direction to destroy a block at
MakeCode.agentDestroyL6: Commands the agent to destroy a block in the given direction
MakeCode.agentDestroyL6|param|dir: the direction to destroy a block at
MakeCode.agentDetectDryBrush: Detects if there is dry brush next to the agent in the specified direction
MakeCode.agentDetectDryBrush|param|dir: the direction to detect the dry brush
MakeCode.agentDetectDryFern: Detects if there is a dry fern next to the agent in the specified direction
MakeCode.agentDetectDryFern|param|dir: the direction to detect the dry fern
MakeCode.agentDetectDryGrass: Detects if there is dry grass next to the agent in the specified direction
MakeCode.agentDetectDryGrass|param|dir: the direction to detect the dry grass
MakeCode.agentLookForHazards: Agent watches the monitor for hazards
MakeCode.agentSeeHazard: Sees that there is a hazard on the monitor
MakeCode.alertTeam: Warns the team of a high-risk area
MakeCode.hazardsRemainL4: Checks that there are fire hazards
MakeCode.hazardsRemainL5: Checks that there are fire hazards
MakeCode.hazardsRemainL6: Checks that there are fire hazards
